name: WebAppVulnerability
description: A case template for handling web application vulnerability incidents
author: DFIR-IRIS
summary: Investigation and mitigation of a web application vulnerability

tasks.title: Identify vulnerable components
tasks.description: Determine the scope of the vulnerability by identifying affected components and systems

tasks.title: Assess risk
tasks.description: Evaluate the potential impact and likelihood of exploitation of the vulnerability

tasks.title: Develop mitigation plan
tasks.description: Create a plan to mitigate the vulnerability, including patching or applying other security measures

tasks.title: Implement mitigation
tasks.description: Apply patches or other security measures according to the mitigation plan

tasks.title: Monitor for exploitation attempts
tasks.description: Monitor logs and other data sources for signs of exploitation attempts targeting the vulnerability

tasks.title: Update security measures
tasks.description: Implement and update security measures to prevent future vulnerabilities

notes.title: Vulnerability description
notes.content: Details of the web application vulnerability

notes.title: Affected components
notes.content: List of affected components and systems

notes.title: Mitigation steps
notes.content: Summary of the steps taken to mitigate the vulnerability
